articles.title: NASA gets first weather report from the Jerezo Crater Mars using a system strapped to Perseverance - Daily Mail
articles.description: NASA shared the first weather report from Jezero Crater on Mars. A system attached to Perseverance's mast  showed it went from -4F to -14 degrees on Feb. 19 at around 10:25pm ET.
articles.content:

articles.title: Stone Age humans were HYPERCARNIVORES and survived on mostly meat - Daily Mail
articles.description: Study authors discovered that humans were an apex predator for about two million years and it was only the extinction of larger animals that changed their diets.
